298618.「くそっ。錬金に 時間がかかりすぎてる。\n いつもの 魔法生物を作るより キツ:
Damn it... this is taking way too long. This
is tougher than creating the usual kind of
magical creature...

298619.「これより 最終工程に移行……。\n ……終わらせるッ！！:
I will now move onto the final step...
...and finish this!

298620.「やっぱり ダメなのか……？\n あたし……なんかじゃ……。:
It's still no good...?
I'm...I'm not...

298622.「あなたは 過去の自分を 超えると言いました。\n だから 最後まで 信じていま:
You did say you would surpass your past
self. That's why I believed in you until the
very end...

298623.「<pc>さんに 恩返しするんでしょう？:
You were planning on repaying <pc>
here, weren't you?

298624.「……そうだ。あたしは\n <pc>に 救ってもらったんだ。\n 大切な家族を…:
...that's right. <pc> saved me once
before...and my precious family...

298625.「一緒に笑ったり 悩んだり\n はげましたりして 支え合う……\n かけがえのな:
The warmth that comes from laughing together,
worrying together, encouraging and supporting
one another...there's nothing else like it!

298626.「すべてを <pc>に 取り戻させるッ。\n あたしたちが！:
We will get everything back for them!
We will for sure!

298629.「こんちわーっ！ チュラリスだよー♪\n きみって 魔法生物かな？ 魔法生物かな:
Hi! I'm Chularis! Are you a magical creature?
You're a magical creature, right?

298630.「ゼフさん。ごめん……ありがとう。\n 結局 最後は 手伝ってもらっちまった。:
Zef, I'm sorry...and thank you. I ended up
needing your help after all.

298631.「……命令以外の呼びかけに 反応せず\n 待機動作を くり返しているのを見ると\:
It seems to have been alchemized successfully into an alchemy doll, as it just keeps repeating standby actions and doesn't respond
to any calls or commands.

298632.「人型にする必要は ありましたか？\n しかも パドレ様に 似ているのですが……:
Did you have to make it look like a human?
It even looks just like Padre to boot...

298633.「いや あの……パドレ様の姿を\n 頭の中で 強くイメージしてたら\n そうなっ:
Well, um...I just had a clear image of him in
my head, and I guess that's what happened.
I didn't do it on purpose, I swear!

298634.「あなたの そういうところ\n 父親のアルテオ そっくりです。\n 困ったもので:
Your resemblance to your father Altheo is
quite uncanny. Honestly, it can be very
troublesome sometimes...

298635.「……よし 時の宝珠を 組み込んだぞ。\n 命令すれば 任意の方向に 時渡りのチ:
Okay! I've attached the Time Jewel. On command it'll release temporal power in any direction we choose. The automated alchemy doll is
finished!

298636.<pc>は\nパドレの錬金人形（だいじなもの）を\n手に入れた！<me 60>:
<pc> received
the Padre Alchemy Doll (Key Item)!<me 60>

298637.「さあ 行ってこい <pc>。\n きっと パドレ様を 連れて戻ってこいよ。:
Go on then, <pc>! I have no doubts
you'll come back with Padre!

298638.「私たち みんなで 応援してるわ。\n どうか うまくいきますように……。:
We're all rooting for you here. I hope that
everything goes well...

298639.これで パドレ救出作戦に\n必要なものが すべて そろった！\nメレアーデの所に:
The preparations for the Padre Rescue Mission
are now complete! Go and report back to
Mereade.
